  • Uses of ActionList in engine.items

    Methods in engine.items that return ActionList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ActionList Item.allowableActions​(Actor owner)
    List of allowable actions that the item can perform to the current actor Example #1: a healing item can have a special skill that can increase the current actor's hitpoints.
    ActionList Item.allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, Location location)
    List of allowable actions that the item allows its owner do to other actor.
    ActionList Item.allowableActions​(Location location)
    List of allowable actions that can be performed on the item when it is on the ground Example #1: a trap can return an action to disarm the trap.

  • Uses of ActionList in engine.positions

    Methods in engine.positions that return ActionList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ActionList Ground.allowableActions​(Actor actor, Location location, java.lang.String direction)
    Returns an empty Action list.

  • Uses of ActionList in game.actors

    Methods in game.actors that return ActionList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ActionList EnemyActor.allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
    checks for weapons in the other actors inventory and if there are any weapons it returns an attack action for those weapons
    ActionList ForestKeeper.allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
    Sets follow behaviour if player is within range of the enemy and then returns actionList
    ActionList RedWolf.allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
    Sets the follow behaviour in the object if the player comes within range and then returns allowable actions
    ActionList Traveller.allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
    A list of buyable actions that an actor can choose to buy from the Traveller
    Methods in game.actors with parameters of type ActionList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Action EnemyActor.playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    At each turn, select a valid action to perform.
    Action Player.playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    simply prints current stats and then returns a menu with all possible actions in it
    Action Traveller.playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    Selects the action that will be performed for the current turn

  • Uses of ActionList in game.ground

    Methods in game.ground that return ActionList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ActionList Gate.allowableActions​(Actor actor, Location location, java.lang.String direction)
    checks to see if the actor has a key with the unlock ability if so it returns a UnlockGate action if the gate is Unlocked then it returns the MovePlayerAction.
    ActionList Puddle.allowableActions​(Actor actor, Location location, java.lang.String direction)
    returns the ConsumableAction when the player is standing exactly on the puddle

  • Uses of ActionList in game.items

    Methods in game.items that return ActionList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ActionList BloodBerry.allowableActions​(Actor owner)
    A list of actions that the BloodBerry can perform
    ActionList BloodBerry.allowableActions​(Actor target, Location location)
    List of allowable actions that the BloodBerry allows its owner do to another actor.
    ActionList Broadsword.allowableActions​(Actor owner)
    A list of actions that can be executed by the Broadsword
    ActionList Broadsword.allowableActions​(Actor target, Location location)
    Gives the actions that can be performed using the broadsword.
    ActionList GiantHammer.allowableActions​(Actor target, Location location)
    Gives the actions that can be performed using the Giant Hammer.
    ActionList GreatKnife.allowableActions​(Actor target, Location location)
    Gives the actions that can be performed using the Great Knife.
    ActionList HealingVial.allowableActions​(Actor owner)
    Returns a replenish action object
    ActionList HealingVial.allowableActions​(Actor target, Location location)
    List of allowable actions that the Healing Vial allows its owner do to another actor.
    ActionList RefreshingFlask.allowableActions​(Actor owner)
    A collection of actions that can be performed using the Refreshing Flask
    ActionList RefreshingFlask.allowableActions​(Actor target, Location location)
    List of allowable actions that the Refreshing Flask allows its owner do to another actor.
    ActionList Runes.allowableActions​(Actor owner)
    returns the list of allowable actions when the Runes are being held by the player
